name: Valenpog's 2023! When you forgor to buy the chocolate...?
name_original: Valenpog's 2023! When you forgor to buy the chocolate...?
description:
HIHI! THANKS FOR TAKING A POG LOOK AT MY 2023 VALENTINE'S GAME!

Instructions~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You are You,  and forgot to buy some valentine's chocolate... There are 3 days left, so you can do it!

It's got around 4 endings, but they can be achieved pretty fast. There are also probably many bugs that I will iron out.
